mods.abstract: Here, in "Land of Oxen" in 1788 Governor Bernardo de Galvex appointed Commandant Pierre Philippe de Marigny to parcel land on the bayou for Canary Islanders. Later, Creole planters bought large estates on the bayou.

titleInfo.title: Louisiana Sea Grant Digital Images Collection
